name: Boston, MA
description: Great places to eat in Boston. Go Patriots!

name: New York, NY
description: Fun places to grab a drink in the city that never sleeps!

name: Chicago, IL
description: From the towering skyscrapers of the Loop to the city's colorful mosaic of unique neighborhoods, Chicago buzzes with energy and excitement.

name: Baltimore, MD
description: Baltimore is the largest city in the State of Maryland, the largest independent city in the United States, and the 26th-most populous city in the country.

name: Washington, DC
description: The Capital of the United States of America

name: Dallas, TX
description: Everything is bigger in Texas! Including the portions!

name: London, UK
description: In London, history collides with art, fashion, food, and good British ale.

name: Moscow
description: During any season, any hour of day, Moscow thrills visitors with its artistry, history and vodka.

name: Tokyo
description: Tokyo offers a seemingly unlimited choice of shopping, entertainment, culture and dining to its visitors.

name: Barcelona, Spain
description: Barcelona is an enchanting seaside city with boundless culture, fabled architecture, and a world-class drinking and dining scene.
